reviews.review_msg: A wonderful instructor. Gives feedback on every exercise. If you read her lecture slides and do well in the fun exercises, you will receive a very good grade.

Her classes are really engaging. Each session includes around 50 slides, so attending the lectures and making notes are necessary. If you take notes in each class and watch the required films , you'll be fine in exams. Grading criteria are clear, and she also offers extra help after class. One of my favorite profs!

She is very easy going and fun. There is a book that you don't have to buy but i would suggest you getting it as it helps with the tests quite a lot. The group project is quite long but its really fun to do and Melanie gives great feedbacks.

She's a very great professor this is legitimate a GPA BOOSTER course you would easily get an A for being consistent in doing your weekly task. The quiz is open book and many attempts so you can easily get a perfect score! Mainly the thing that you do is watch movies in this course. Highly recommend and she's very caring to her students too!
Mrs Cassidy is a very nice teacher, who's very interactive with the students. 100% would take her classes again/

U get to watch a bunch of cool randomish movies. Also we had a group project where she let me be in group of 3 which helped me with a good grade(trust me it's a good thing, I got in a group of 4 in this other gpa booster course and there was this guy). Also the exams and quizzes are online. For legal reasons I strongly condemn cheating in any form.
Her class is entertaining. Highly recommend.

Lots of assignment and group work. Expects you to read like 30 pages from the textbook every week. Super stressful, especially considering that you have the group work, quiz and assignment almost every week and exams. The stuff is not very hard, and quite interesting actually, but the amount of stuff is phenomenal. Terrible choice for an elective.

Melanie Cassidy is the coolest professor I have seen here, if you miss a deadline, she will give you an extension, her quizzes are very easy, even her forums are scoring and she gives good feedback to everyone on their movie assignment.

She's amazing, she's been in the field of her course so she knows what she's talking about. She's super nice and caring, if you participate and read you'll be good. One of the best professors I've had

She is amazing, very caring, nice to talk to and very kind. Her quizzes were easy and she allows you to do them until you got good grades. Her project is interesting but lots of work, pick good teammates or you will be like me. If you tried then you can easily get an A, but it's not totally easy though.

The experience this prof has working in the industry definitely shows. All of the knowledge she shares flows naturally and you can really tell she cares about the wellbeing of students.

A good amount of work every week but nothing you can't finish in 1 day. If you understand image composition, you'll do well with the storyboard and shooting.
